data.text: Currently a senior frontend developer at Crate and Barrel. #webperf
Formerly a full stack software engineer at Alpha Medical.
Formerly a full stack developer in The Spokesman-Review's newsroom.
Sometimes shouts into the wind on Twitter.
Keeps his LinkedIn up to date, doesn't know why.
Used to do photography until someone stole his camera bag.
Misses his squish-faced friend, Melvin the Fluffy. RIP.
Struggles to maintain sanity working from home with two cats and an idiot doodle.
Loves Tailwind CSS, never wants to go back to the old, dark ways.
Current fascination is Remix. This website built with it.
